name: Ex-Imperium!
description:
Ex- Imperium is a game where you play as an unstable god trying to save the villagers from your own powers going out of control, you need to protect the villager and temple from enemies and disasters which will drive you into madness if they continue.

Controls:

WASD: pan camera
Left Click: cast selected spell
Bottom right corner: select spell (Thunder, Rain, Wind)
